name: kobalt-plugin
description: A figma plugin to generate data for kobalt-codegen to read from

scripts.tsc: npm run tsc:plugin && npm run tsc:view
scripts.tsc:watch: concurrently -n widget,iframe "npm run tsc:plugin -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "npm run tsc:view -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.build: npm run build:view && npm run build:plugin -- --minify
scripts.build:watch: concurrently -n widget,iframe "npm run build:plugin -- --watch" "npm run build:view -- --watch"

author: Tim Alaerts
